rules_text:
Savage Land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
{4}{RG}: Until end of turn, Savage Land becomes a 4/4 Dinosaur creature with trample and “Whenever this creature is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it.” It's still a land. Activate only once each turn. [i](It must survive the damage to get the counter.)[/i]
